name: Lightning Dragon ⚡🐉
description: A swift dragon that strikes with electric fury!
lore: Born from storm clouds, these dragons channel pure electricity through their scales.

name: Crystal Shield 💎🛡️
description: A magical shield that reflects damage back to attackers
lore: Forged by emoji mages from pure crystal, these shields shimmer with protective energy.

name: Shadow Assassin 🌑🥷
description: A stealthy killer that strikes from the shadows
lore: Trained in the dark arts of emoji shadow magic, these assassins move like whispers.

name: Flame Phoenix 🔥🐦
description: A fiery bird that rises stronger from defeat
lore: These majestic birds burn with eternal flame, rising from their own ashes stronger than before.

name: Frost Giant ❄️🗿
description: A mighty giant that freezes enemies with every step
lore: Ancient stone giants infused with the power of winter, their footsteps leave trails of ice.

name: Poison Cloud ☠️☁️
description: A toxic cloud that spreads poison to all enemies
lore: Conjured by emoji alchemists, these clouds bring death to all who breathe their toxic fumes.

name: Healing Spring 💧🌸
description: A magical spring that restores health to allies
lore: Sacred springs blessed by emoji nature spirits, their waters can heal any wound.

name: Thunder Hammer ⚡🔨
description: A mighty hammer that calls down lightning strikes
lore: Forged in the heart of emoji thunderstorms, these hammers channel pure electrical fury.

name: Mirror Image 🪞👥
description: Creates illusory copies that confuse enemies
lore: Mastered by emoji illusionists, these spells create perfect copies that baffle and confuse.

name: Wind Tornado 🌪️💨
description: A powerful tornado that sweeps enemies away
lore: Summoned by emoji weather mages, these cyclones can tear apart entire battlefields.
